actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend title 4, chapter 4, section 4-904 of the District of Columbia Code in order to eliminate additional uncompensated work time of the officers of the Metropolitan Police Department.

summary.text: Eliminates, under the District of Columbia Code, uncompensated worktime of rollcall time from the officers of the Metropolitian Police Department.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 4, chapter 4, section 4-904 of the District of Columbia Code in order to eliminate additional uncompensated work time of the officers of the Metropolitan Police Department.
